Uses of Package
org.sensorhub.api.persistence

  • Packages that use org.sensorhub.api.persistence 
    Package Description
    org.sensorhub.api.persistence  
    org.sensorhub.impl  
    org.sensorhub.impl.persistence  
  • Classes in org.sensorhub.api.persistence used by org.sensorhub.api.persistence 
    Class and Description
    DataKey
    Base class for all data storage keys used in SensorHub.
    IBasicStorage
    Storage for one or more data streams coming from a single source.
    IDataFilter
    Base interface for filter objects allowing to get records by criteria
    IDataRecord
    Interface encapsulating records composed of a key and a data block as value
    IRecordDataStore
    Base interface for all record storage implementations
    IStorageModule 
    ITimeSeriesDataStore
    This interface adds time tagging support to a record storage
    StorageConfig
    Simple data structure for describing storage configuration options
    StorageEvent
    Base class for events generated by storage modules
    StorageEvent.Type
    Possible event types for a StorageEvent
    StorageException
    Exception type generated by persistence API
    StorageIndexDescriptor 
    StorageIndexDescriptor.IndexType 
  • Classes in org.sensorhub.api.persistence used by org.sensorhub.impl 
    Class and Description
    IPersistenceManager
    Management interface for persistent storage modules
